subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
Sewers and Sewage
lead_paragraph: To the Oakland A’s, cloaked in low-budget anonymity, a sewer blockage was just one more thing to laugh about in a season in which they have compiled the club’s best start since 1990.
snippet: To the Oakland A’s, cloaked in low-budget anonymity, a sewer blockage was just one more thing to laugh about in a season in which they have compiled the club’s best start since 1990.
